resources.string:
Xenesis basically stands for the term evolution. X in Xenesis stands for extreme. Xenesis is one of the most popular tech fest among techno geeks of Gujarat, with average 1500 participants and more than 2000 visitors since the inception in 2007. Xenesis 2017 will be held on 24th and 25th of March. In this 10th season of Xenesis we have included all new events, some amazing workshops/seminars and X-potentially guaranteed fun.
So, Gear up for the Revolution of an Extreme Era as we prepare the biggest tech-fest of this season.
LDRP-ITR, Near KH – 5, Sector – 15, Gandhinagar, Gujarat – 382015

LDRP INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY AND RESEARCH, Gandhinagar was established in 2005 – 2006. The college has made steady progress during since its existence. Established as a pace setting Institute of Technical Education imparting undergraduate and postgraduate education, it has played a vital role in engineering colleges of Gujarat. In this mission today it has progressed to offering several B.E., M.B.A. and M.C.A. Programs and facilities. The college also undertakes R and D activities and offers testing, consultancy and other extension services including continuing education to the small industries and the placement of the students through the Department of Training and Placement.
As a prestigious state institute, LDRP has long recognized its role in engineering education, generation and dissemination of useful and relevant technological, industrial and economical development of the country, the institute has contributed in the application of science and technology in the service of the society through different programs of International aid and assistance, the institute has all along endeavored to discharge its obligations successfully with the efforts of its faculty expertise and well developed world class facilities.
